posts.post_content:
Hello friends.  I am in need of the four Cobb cards in the T206 set.  If you have one with solid eye appeal in SGC 40-50 (Sorry, no PSA) please feel free to send me a scan and asking price.    [url]andygarden09@yahoo.com[/url]  


EDITED: Got the Bat Off!  Three to go!

Best,

Andy
